attributes.title: A Life Without Fear is Possible (Part 1)
attributes.description:
In the morning satsang of 25 February 2013, Paramahamsa Nithyananda discusses the nature of inauthenticity. Anything we fear in life is something we are inauthentic about. For example, if we fear death we have the inauthentic belief that we are immortal. Fear-free life is possible when we become completely authentic. Greed-free life is also possible when we are in a state of complete integrity. Worry disappears when we assume responsibility, and the need for attention is dissolved when we reach out to enrich others. Once we resolve these problems related to the four lower chakras, enlightenment simply blossoms.

Delivered on 25th February 2013 part1 of 2 to a live global audience by Paramahamsa Nithyananda
